text: Brian LaWan Alexander (August 26, 1975 â€“ May 15, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He played for Salon Vilpas in 1998. His career began 2003. He played college basketball at the University of Detroit Mercy. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. Alexander died on May 15, 2020 in Denver, Colorado of a heart attack, aged 44.He is survived by his ChildrenTitans Mourn The Loss Of Former Standout Brian Alexander ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:African-American basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Detroit
title: Brian Alexander (basketball)
